sentences.en: An automatic weather station feeds information on wind direction to the computer.
sentences.cn: 自动化气象站将风向信息输入计算机。

sentences.en: Eddie slipped the safety catch on his automatic back into place.
sentences.cn: 埃迪将自动步枪的保险栓重新拉上。

sentences.en: Fran began her automatic patter about how Jon had been unavoidably detained.
sentences.cn: 弗兰开始不由自主地唠叨起乔恩是怎样无可避免地被扣留的。

sentences.en: He drew his automatic and began running in the direction of the sounds.
sentences.cn: 他拔出自动枪，朝发出声音的方向跑去。

sentences.en: His car was raked with fire from automatic weapons.
sentences.cn: 他的车遭到自动武器火力的扫射。

sentences.en: Israel offers automatic citizenship to all Jews who want it, whatever colour they are and whichever language they speak.
sentences.cn: 犹太人只要愿意，均可自动加入以色列国籍，不管他们是什么肤色，不管他们说何种语言。
我的照相机是全自动的。

sentences.en: The bill provides for the automatic review of all death sentences.
sentences.cn: 该法案规定所有死刑判决都要自动接受审核。

sentences.en: The gunmen opened fire with automatic weapons.
sentences.cn: 歹徒用自动武器开火了。

sentences.en: The movements of machines are completely automatic, you only need to start and stop the machines.
sentences.cn: 运行是完全自动的, 你只需开关机器就行了.

sentences.en: They were dressed in camouflage and carried automatic rifles.
sentences.cn: 他们身穿迷彩服，携带自动步枪。

sentences.en: Those drivers should face an automatic charge of manslaughter.
sentences.cn: 那些司机必然会受到过失杀人的指控。

sentences.en: To expect automatic protection from the police is impractical.
sentences.cn: 期望警方自动提供保护是不现实的.

sentences.en: We heard the rapid crackle of automatic gunfire.
sentences.cn: 我们听到自动枪炮发出快速的射击声.

sentences.en: You will get an automatic increase in pay every year.
sentences.cn: 你每年一定有一次加薪.

sentences.en: You've made that same trip so many times before that you're on automatic pilot.
sentences.cn: 这一行程你以前已经走过多次了，早就了如指掌了。

a weapon that can fire bullets continuously
